templates: The patient's dream is infested with {enemies}. Your job is to enter this dream and clean up everything.
A swarm of {enemies} has invaded this dream. Your mission is to eradicate them all.
This client's dream is corrupted by {enemies}, requiring immediate attention. Do your job.
The patient can't rest peacefully with {enemies} haunting their dreams. Time to do some cleaning.
This dream has become a breeding ground for {enemies}. Your expertise as a dream cleaner is urgently needed.
Poor guy is having a nightmare filled with {enemies}. Go in there and help him out.
